TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Panel extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

summary.span: 表示作为其他控件的容器的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that acts as a container for other controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件是其他控件的容器。The control is a container for other controls. 如果要以编程方式生成控件、隐藏/显示一组控件或对一组控件进行本地化, 此方法特别有用。It is especially useful when you want to generate controls programmatically, hide/show a group of controls, or localize a group of controls. 属性用于本地化控件的内容, 以显示从右向左书写的语言 (例如阿拉伯语或希伯来语) 的文本。The property is useful for localizing a control's content to display text for languages that are written from right to left, such as Arabic or Hebrew. 控件提供了几个属性, 这些属性允许您自定义行为并显示其内容。The control provides several properties that allow you to customize the behavior and display of its contents. 使用属性显示控件的自定义图像。 Use the property to display a custom image for the control. 使用属性为控件指定滚动条。Use the property to specify scroll bars for the control. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用控件以编程方式生成控件并隐藏/显示一组控件。The following example illustrates the use of a control to generate controls programmatically and to hide/show a group of controls. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Panel Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel Example 2/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Panel Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel Example 2/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Panel Web Server Control Overview

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建控件的新实例, 该控件包含右对齐的控件。The following example illustrates how to create a new instance of the control containing a control that is aligned to the right. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Panel.Panel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel.Panel Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Panel.Panel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel.Panel Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写自定义服务器控件中的方法, 使文本始终显示为粗体。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the text always displays as bold. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以显示控件的自定义图像。Use this property to display a custom image for the control. 如果图像小于, 则会平铺以填充。If the image is smaller than the , it will be tiled to fill in the . > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅在支持 HTML 4.0 或更高版本的浏览器上受支持。This property is supported only on browsers that support HTML 4.0 or later. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式设置的属性。The following example illustrates how to programmatically set the property of the . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Panel.BackImageUrl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel.BackImageUrl Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Panel.BackImageUrl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel.BackImageUrl Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中包含的默认按钮的标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the identifier for the default button that is contained in the control.

value.span: 一个字符串值，对应于 中包含的按钮控件的 。

span.span: A string value corresponding to the for a button control contained in the .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串，指示 没有默认按钮。

span.span: The default is an empty string, indicating that the does not have a default button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指示在控件具有焦点并且用户按 ENTER 键时单击的按钮。 Use the property to indicate which button gets clicked when the control has focus and the user presses the ENTER key. 可以设置为控件的标识符, 也可以设置为除控件以外实现接口的任何控件的标识符。 The can be set to the identifier for a control or any control that implements the interface except a control. 如果将设置为不实现接口的控件, 或设置为不包含在控件中的控件, 则该控件在呈现时将引发异常。 If the is set to a control that does not implement the interface, or to a control that is not contained in the control, the control throws an exception while rendering. 以下方案不支持设置属性:Setting the property is not supported for the following scenarios: - 将焦点设置在面板的输入控件外, 然后按 ENTER 键。Setting focus outside of the input controls in the panel and then pressing the ENTER key. 不保证默认的回发操作触发。The default post back action is not guaranteed to trigger. - 按 ENTER 键时, 焦点位于多行文本框内。Pressing the ENTER key with focus inside a multi-line textbox. 在多行文本框中, 按 ENTER 键应在文本框中创建一个新行, 这是预期的行为。In a multi-line textbox, pressing the ENTER key should create a new line in the textbox which is the expected behavior. 在浏览器中, 如果在多行文本框中按 ENTER 键, 则会触发回发, 但要改为输入键来创建新行, 则可以将 JavaScript 函数附加到输入控件。In browsers where the pressing the ENTER key inside a multi-line textbox triggers a post back but you want the ENTER key to create a new line instead you can attach a JavaScript function to the input control. 脚本应捕获 ENTER 键并停止回发。The script should capture the ENTER key and stop the post back. 例如, 可以使用属性集合添加`onKeyPress`事件的客户端脚本。For example, you can use the property collection to add client script for the `onKeyPress` event. - 引用作为控件的默认按钮。Referencing a default button that is a control. 仅支持和控件。Only and controls are supported. - 在异步回发过程中, 当控件不在控件内时, 以编程方式更改。Changing the programmatically during an asynchronous post back when the control is not inside of an control. 可以通过将一个或多个控件添加到页面上来启用异步 post。Asynchronous post backs can be enabled on a page by adding one or more controls to the page. 控件可用于更新页面的选定区域, 而不是使用回发来更新整个页面。 controls can be used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)和[部分页呈现概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). - 通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。Setting this property by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection Direction { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection Direction
Public Overridable Property Direction As ContentDirection

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::ContentDirection Direction { System::Web::UI::WebControls::ContentDirection get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ContentDirection value); };
member this.Direction : System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件中显示包含文本的控件的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction in which to display controls that include text in a control.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定控件中包含文本的控件的显示方向。 Use the property to specify the display direction for controls that include text in a control. 使用枚举值之一设置此属性。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置内容方向。The content direction is not set.| |`LeftToRight`|内容方向从左到右。The content direction is left to right.| |`RightToLeft`|内容方向是从右到左。The content direction is right to left.| 如果指定`LeftToRight`, 则包含文本的子控件从左到右显示。If you specify `LeftToRight`, child controls that include text display from left to right. 如果指定`RightToLeft`, 则包含文本的子控件从右到左显示。If you specify `RightToLeft`, child controls that include text display right to left. 用于`RightToLeft`显示从右向左书写的语言 (例如阿拉伯语或希伯来语) 的文本。Use `RightToLeft` to display text for languages that are written from right to left, such as Arabic or Hebrew. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅在支持 HTML 4.0 或更高版本的浏览器上受支持。This property is supported only on browsers that support HTML 4.0 or later. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式设置属性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically set the property. 使用枚举值填充控件 。A control is populated with the enumeration values. 面板中标签和单选按钮的显示方向会根据用户从列表框中选择的值更改。The display direction of the label and radio buttons in the panel change, based on the value the user selects from the list box. 请注意, 此示例使用英文文本。Note that this example uses English text. 因此, 当选择`RightToLeft`此值时, 文本将在控件的右侧对齐, 但会保留英语文本的从左到右顺序。Therefore, when the `RightToLeft` value is selected, the text is justified on the right side of the control, but the left-to-right order of the English text is maintained. 在实际应用程序中, 如果要显示从左到右`RightToLeft`语言的文本, 则不能将属性设置为。In a real-world application you would not set the property to `RightToLeft` if you were displaying text for a left-to-right language. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-vb[Panel.Direction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Panel.Direction/VB/panel.directionvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置面板控件中包含的控件组的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the caption for the group of controls that is contained in the panel control.

value.span: 面板控件中包含的子控件的标题文本。

span.span: The caption text for the child controls contained in the panel control.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可为控件中包含的控件组显示框架和标题。 Use the property to display a frame and caption for the group of controls that is contained in the control. 控件的值是使用 HTML 4.0 规范中引入的字段集和图例元素呈现的。The value of a control is rendered using the FIELDSET and LEGEND elements, which were introduced in the HTML 4.0 specification. 如果客户端浏览器使用 HTML 3.2, 则不会呈现此值。If the client browser uses HTML 3.2, the value is not rendered. 请参阅客户端浏览器文档, 了解有关字段集和图例元素显示方式的详细信息。Refer to your client browser documentation for details on how the FIELDSET and LEGEND elements are displayed. 设置此属性后, 可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来指定中元素的对齐方式。Use this property to specify the alignment of the elements in the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在中右对齐或左对齐控件。The following example illustrates how to right-align or left-align the controls within the . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Panel.HorizontalAlign Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel.HorizontalAlign Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Panel.HorizontalAlign Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel.HorizontalAlign Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定控件中滚动条的可见性和位置。 Use the property to specify the visibility and position of scroll bars in a control. 使用枚举值之一设置此属性。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|不显示任何滚动条。No scroll bars are shown.| |`Horizontal`|只显示水平滚动条。Only a horizontal scroll bar is shown.| |`Vertical`|只显示垂直滚动条。Only a vertical scroll bar is shown.| |`Both`|同时显示水平滚动条和垂直滚动条。Both horizontal and vertical scroll bars are shown.| |`Auto`|如有必要, 将显示水平、垂直或同时显示这两个滚动条。If necessary, horizontal, vertical, or both scroll bars are shown. 要不然也可以不显示任何滚动条。Otherwise, no scroll bars are shown.| 如果`Auto` 为属性指定, 则当控件内容的大小超过控件本身的大小时, 将自动显示滚动条。 If you specify `Auto` for the property, scroll bars are automatically shown when the size of the content in a control exceeds the size of the control itself. 例如, 如果控件包含一个表, 并且该面板的宽度不足以显示表中的所有行, 则将显示一个垂直滚动条。For example, if a control contains a table, and the panel is not wide enough to display all the rows in the table, a vertical scroll bar is shown. 如果表的大小超过面板的高度和宽度, 则会同时显示垂直滚动条和水平滚动条。If the size of the table exceeds the height and width of the panel, both vertical and horizontal scroll bars are shown. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅在支持 HTML 4.0 或更高版本的浏览器上受支持。This property is supported only on browsers that support HTML 4.0 or later. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式将属性设置`Auto`为。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property to `Auto`. 面板包含一个表, 其中的全部内容超出了面板的大小。The panel contains a table, the entire contents of which exceed the size of the panel. 这会导致垂直滚动条和水平滚动条在呈现面板时自动显示。This causes both vertical and horizontal scroll bars to be automatically displayed when the panel is rendered. 然后, 用户可以滚动查看表中的所有数据。The user can then scroll to view all the data in the table. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Panel.Scrollbars#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Panel.Scrollbars/CS/panel.scrollbarscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Panel.Scrollbars#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Panel.Scrollbars/VB/panel.scrollbarsvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式设置属性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically set the property. 使用枚举值填充控件 。A control is populated with the enumeration values. 面板中显示的滚动条将根据用户从列表框中选择的值更改。The scroll bars displayed in the panel change, based on the value the user selects from the list box. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Panel.Scrollbars2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Panel.Scrollbars2/CS/panel.scrollbars2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Panel.Scrollbars2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Panel.Scrollbars2/VB/panel.scrollbars2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为“disabled”。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0, 则为; 否则为。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在控件被禁用时 ASP.NET 应如何呈现控件的 HTML。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`, 则在禁用`disabled`控件时, ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`, 则在禁用`class`控件时, ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以包装的内容。Use this property to wrap the contents of the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式设置 控件的属性。The following example illustrates how to programmatically set the property of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
